LanguageData.Bullet_Dummy.label: dummy attack
LanguageData.Dummy_Human.label: corpse dummy
LanguageData.Dummy_Human.description: An unlucky corpse made into a dummy to attract enemies' firepower.
LanguageData.Dummy_Regular.label: dummy
LanguageData.Dummy_Regular.description: A dummy made to attract hostile firepower. Might not really look like your pawns, but enough to fool raiders.
LanguageData.Dummy_Straw.label: scarecrow
LanguageData.Dummy_Straw.description: A straw-made dummy which can scarce birds, and bird-brain raiders. Highly flammable!
LanguageData.Gun_Dummy.label: dummy gun
LanguageData.Gun_Dummy.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: dummy gun
